thread.section_title: Hotel de Suez - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Dated but lovely
thread.title_full: Dated but lovely - Review of Hotel de Suez, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Brunts1980
title: Dated but lovely
text:
We stayed for 3 nights in this hotel.
It has typical period features and is situated in a great location!
The staff did not have much knowledge about the local bars and restaurants but the hotel is close to the quieter Opera House district or the avenues near Notre Dame.
The en suite was probably last decorated in 1970. However the shower was really powerful and a very relaxing soak. The bed linen made us itch a little but the beds were quite comfy.
All in all, despite the carpeted walls and being about 6 decades out of date, this hotel is actually quite alright!
